Package io.anyline.view

Class ScanView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • io.anyline.camera.CameraView
          • io.anyline.view.ScanView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, DocumentNotifierListener, UIChangeListener
    public class ScanView
extends CameraView
implements UIChangeListener, DocumentNotifierListener

    A generic view that combines the AnylineWebView and the FlashView.

    This view is used in order to add a specific type of AbstractScanViewPlugin, or more AbstractScanViewPlugin
